__e: If you built a fire, some crazy thing would shoot at you.
The fact that they were pregnant is very, very unfortunate, but it's also unfortunate that they were women. But on the other hand, I've been shot at by women myself, so that doesn't-
I've been shot at by the enemy.
We had mortars fire at us from somewhere near that hamlet.
- Did you see where it came from?
We were about an hour in and we started taking fire from our right flank.
